overview: Three men. Three stories.  Noel, a fisherman battling with his curiosity, commits a grave mistake and ends up paying the price.  Xander, a man assigned to track down an evasive drug pusher, finds the manâ€™s blind daughter who is longing for her island hometown instead.  Emman, a stranger seeking refuge in a seaside village, is befriended by a local who asks for his help but finds that there is more to the boy than what meets the eye.  Huwebes Huwebes is a triptych of stories that embraces the sea, depicting different lives, all battling one war.
title: Huwebes Huwebes
